Scripts.OnLoad:
self.InsetBorderTopLeft:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderTopLeft:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.IBackground, 0, 0)
self.InsetBorderTopRight:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderTopRight:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", self.IBackground, 0, 0)
self.InsetBorderBottomLeft:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderBottomLeft:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", self.IBackground, 0, -1)
self.InsetBorderBottomRight:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderBottomRight:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.IBackground, 0, -1)
self.InsetBorderTop:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderTop:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.InsetBorderTopLeft, "TOPRIGHT", 0, 0) self.InsetBorderTop:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", self.InsetBorderTopRight, "TOPLEFT", 0, 0)
self.InsetBorderBottom:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderBottom:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", self.InsetBorderBottomLeft, "BOTTOMRIGHT", 0, 0) self.InsetBorderBottom:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.InsetBorderBottomRight, "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, 0)
self.InsetBorderLeft:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderLeft:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.InsetBorderTopLeft, "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, 0) self.InsetBorderLeft:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", self.InsetBorderBottomLeft, "TOPLEFT", 0, 0)
self.InsetBorderRight:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderRight:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", self.InsetBorderTopRight, "BOTTOMRIGHT", 0, 0) self.InsetBorderRight:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.InsetBorderBottomRight, "TOPRIGHT", 0, 0)

self.InsetTopLeftCorner:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetTopLeftCorner:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", 0, 0)
self.InsetTopRightCorner:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetTopRightCorner:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", 0, 0)
self.InsetBotLeftCorner:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBotLeftCorner:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", 0, 0)
self.InsetBotRightCorner:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBotRightCorner:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", 0, 0)
self.InsetTopBorder:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetTopBorder:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.InsetTopLeftCorner, "TOPRIGHT", 0, 0) self.InsetTopBorder:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", self.InsetTopRightCorner, "TOPLEFT", 0, 0)
self.InsetBottomBorder:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBottomBorder:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", self.InsetBotLeftCorner, "BOTTOMRIGHT", 0, 0) self.InsetBottomBorder:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.InsetBotRightCorner, "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, 0)
self.InsetLeftBorder:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetLeftBorder:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.InsetTopLeftCorner, "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, 0) self.InsetLeftBorder:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", self.InsetBotLeftCorner, "TOPLEFT", 0, 0)
self.InsetRightBorder:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetRightBorder:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", self.InsetTopRightCorner, "BOTTOMRIGHT", 0, 0) self.InsetRightBorder:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.InsetBotRightCorner, "TOPRIGHT", 0, 0)

self.InsetBorderRightMiddle:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderRightMiddle:SetPoint("TOP", self.InsetBorderTopRight, "BOTTOM") self.InsetBorderRightMiddle:SetPoint("BOTTOM", self.InsetBorderBottomRight, "TOP")
self.InsetBorderLeftMiddle:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderLeftMiddle:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.InsetBorderTopLeft, "BOTTOMLEFT") self.InsetBorderLeftMiddle:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", self.InsetBorderBottomLeft, "TOPLEFT")
self.InsetBorderTopMiddle:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderTopMiddle:SetPoint("RIGHT", self.InsetBorderTopRight, "LEFT") self.InsetBorderTopMiddle:SetPoint("LEFT", self.InsetBorderTopLeft, "RIGHT")
self.InsetBorderBottomMiddle:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderBottomMiddle:SetPoint("RIGHT", self.InsetBorderBottomRight, "LEFT") self.InsetBorderBottomMiddle:SetPoint("LEFT", self.InsetBorderBottomLeft, "RIGHT")
self.InsetBg:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBg:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.InsetBorderTopLeft, "BOTTOMRIGHT") self.InsetBg:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.InsetBorderBottomRight, "TOPLEFT")

self.InsetBorderRightMiddle:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderRightMiddle:SetPoint("TOP", self.InsetBorderTopRight, "BOTTOM") self.InsetBorderRightMiddle:SetPoint("BOTTOM", self.InsetBorderBottomRight, "TOP")
self.InsetBorderLeftMiddle:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderLeftMiddle:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.InsetBorderTopLeft, "BOTTOMLEFT") self.InsetBorderLeftMiddle:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", self.InsetBorderBottomLeft, "TOPLEFT")
self.InsetBorderTopMiddle:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderTopMiddle:SetPoint("RIGHT", self.InsetBorderTopRight, "LEFT") self.InsetBorderTopMiddle:SetPoint("LEFT", self.InsetBorderTopLeft, "RIGHT")
self.InsetBorderBottomMiddle:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderBottomMiddle:SetPoint("RIGHT", self.InsetBorderBottomRight, "LEFT") self.InsetBorderBottomMiddle:SetPoint("LEFT", self.InsetBorderBottomLeft, "RIGHT")

Scripts.OnClick: self:GetParent():Hide(); if self:GetParent().OnCloseFunc then self:GetParent().OnCloseFunc() end

Scripts.OnMouseDown: local point, relativeTo, relativePoint, x, y = self.Icon:GetPoint() self.origX = x self.origY = y self.Icon:SetPoint(point, relativeTo, relativePoint, x-1, y-1)
Scripts.OnMouseUp: local point, relativeTo, relativePoint = self.Icon:GetPoint() self.Icon:SetPoint(point, relativeTo, relativePoint, self.origX, self.origY)
Scripts.OnHide: local point, relativeTo, relativePoint = self.Icon:GetPoint() self.Icon:SetPoint(point, relativeTo, relativePoint, self.origX, self.origY)
Scripts.OnEnter: if (self.tooltip) then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_CURSOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.tooltip, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b) end

Scripts.OnClick: if HideParentPanel then HideParentPanel(self); else self:GetParent():Hide() end
